sample.bug_detail_desc: 在置換node的successor時，沒有將node賦值給prevnode，造成prevnode一直是空值且所有node的新successor都是空值，導致除了輸入空值外的所有情況都會錯誤

patchs_eval.reparied_code:
class Node:
    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.successor = None
def reverse_linked_list(node):
    prevnode = None
    while node:
        nextnode = node.successor
        node.successor = prevnode
        prevnode = node
        node = nextnode
    return prevnode
head = Node(1)
head.successor = Node(2)
head.successor.successor = Node(3)
new_head = reverse_linked_list(head)
current = new_head
while current:
    print(current.value)
    current = current.successor

def reverse_linked_list(node):
    prevnode = None
    while node:
        nextnode = node.successor
        node.successor = prevnode
        prevnode = node
        node = nextnode
    return prevnode

def reverse_linked_list(node):
    prevnode = None
    while node:
        nextnode = node.successor
        node.successor = prevnode
        prevnode = node
        node = nextnode
    return prevnode
